title: trimate Electric Car Heating Blanket Plush 3 Heat Settings, Auto Shutoff, Washable, 55 X 40, Plugs into Cars 12v and Trucks 24v Outlet, Great for Cold Weather, Tailgating, Emergency Kits, Gray
features: CAR ADAPTABLE- Unlike other electric car blankets, this soft 12&24-volt electric blanket can plug into 12V & 24V cigarette lighter. The blanket featured a 96-inch long cord brings some warmth to passengers in the front or back seat in cold weather. It is the perfect cold weather car/truck/SUV accessory.

3 HEAT SETTING -- Featured with 3 Heat Setting and constructed with 270GSM plush, it can give the perfect amount of comfort and warmth no matter the weather outside. Even without the extra heat function, the 270GSM plush makes this a perfect lap blanket in the car. You can easily keep warm on fall or winter road trips with this heated plush throw.

3 TIMER SETTINGS/AUTO SHUTOFF -- Equipped with 30, 45, and 60 minute timer settings with LED indicators, you can choose how long you would like your blanket to be on. If no time is selected the blanket will automatically shut off after 45 minutes to prevent from overheating.

MACHINE WASHABLE- The detachable connector makes this electric blanket conveniently machine washable for easy care and cleaning. Simply remove the cord and wash with cool water on the gentle cycle, then tumble dry low or air dry.
PRODUCT DETAILS- Dimensions: 55” (L) x 40” (W), Cord length: 96”. Material: 270GSM plush. Includes storage bag with handles.
description: Unlike other electric blankets, this electric blanket can work on 12V and 24V cigarette lighters at the same time. It is constructed with 270gsm plush. Featured with 3 Heat Setting, it can give the perfect amount of comfort and warmth no matter the weather outside. This 270GSM plush makes this a perfect lap blanket in the car even without the extra heat function. 3 Timer and Auto Shut Off, to prevent overheating. 96- inch long cord makes it easy to reach front seat and back seats. These features make it ideal for road trips, tailgating or camping!
